lesson_html:
• Hello! - A common way to greet someone.
  • Good morning! - Used in the morning until around noon.
  • Good afternoon! - Used from noon until about 5 PM.
  • Good evening! - Used after 5 PM until bedtime.
  • How are you? - A friendly way to ask about someone's well-being.

items.explanation_en: A formal way to ask someone about their well-being.
A common question to ask about the current time.
A way to check on someone's well-being.
Used when you haven't seen someone in a long time.
A casual way to ask about someone's upcoming activities.
A polite expression of concern for someone's health.
A way to ask someone about their presence in a location.
A friendly inquiry about whether someone has had a meal.
A way to ask if someone is having a good day.
A friendly way to say goodbye while expressing concern.
